dcterms:creator: Nilda José Martínez-Fernández
Anna Scaini
Carlos Perez-Gutierrez
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 20 soil moisture stations from North-Western Spain, for the years 2016-2017, with a temporal resolution of 15 days based on the availability of the features. It includes NDVI obtained from MODIS, SAR back scattering coefficients from Sentinel 1, and weather parameters such as temperature, relative humidity, and precipitation.
dcterms:title: Spain

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 68 soil moisture stations from the USA, for the years 2018-2019, with a daily resolution based on the availability of the features. It includes 15 temporal features such as different weather and soil parameters.
dcterms:title: USA
